name: Pizza-Salami
description: An Italian-style pizza topped generously with salami and cheese on a crispy crust.

name: Pizza-Basil
description: A classic pizza topped with fresh basil leaves, mozzarella cheese, and a rich tomato sauce.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A warm and comforting hot chocolate, made with rich cocoa and topped with whipped cream.

name: Ice-cream Sundae
description: A delicious ice-cream sundae with a variety of toppings including chocolate sauce and sprinkles.

name: Burger with Melted Cheese
description: A juicy beef burger topped with melted cheese, lettuce, and tomato, served in a toasted bun.

name: Chicken Burger
description: A crispy chicken burger with lettuce, mayo, and a soft bun for a classic taste.

name: Bacon Cheese Burger
description: A savory burger topped with crispy bacon, melted cheese, and a rich barbecue sauce.

name: Carrot Raisin Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with shredded carrots and plump raisins, tossed in a light dressing.

name: Tomato Salad
description: A fresh tomato salad with herbs, olive oil, and a hint of balsamic vinegar.

name: Chickpea Salad
description: A healthy chickpea salad mixed with fresh vegetables and a zesty lemon vinaigrette.

name: Pumpkin Salad
description: A flavorful pumpkin salad with feta cheese and seeds, drizzled with a light dressing.

name: Spinach Salad
description: A vibrant spinach salad with pomegranate seeds and grilled chicken, perfect for a light meal.

name: Fresh Fruit Salad
description: A colorful mix of fresh seasonal fruits, topped with a touch of mint for extra freshness.
